We Are Story Tellers

We curate a collection of purposeful stories about people living a meaningful life through experience and tapping into their human potential. Dad is Editor At Large and writes for various outfits big and small.

We travel and write about it to inspire families to redefine something “impossible” - as achievable.

Think For Yourself

Think For Yourself is all about living a meaningful life through experience. It's an independent publishing collective made up of creatives, activists, entrepreneurs & authors who believe that in producing amazing, perspective-changing work and compelling stories, we can empower people to better succeed in life. We are independent, inclusive and determined to inspire people to live life to the fullest.
